## Import data

```{r}
#install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
data <- read_csv("pva97nko.csv", na=c("","NA",".", "?"))
```

## Data cleaning and define measure levels

```{r}
## data cleaning and define measure levels ##
data <- data %>% 
  mutate(across(where(is.character) & !c(StatusCat96NK, DemGender,DemHomeOwner), parse_number)) %>% 
  mutate(across(where(is.character) | c(StatusCatStarAll, DemCluster, TargetB), as.factor))
```

## Examine all the variables among the first 10 observations

```{r}
print(data, width = Inf)
```

**The variables with missing values among the first 10 observations are TargetD, GiftAvgCard36, and DemAge. They are all numerical variables.**
